mapper.select: select w.wishlist_no wishlistNo , w.user_no userNo , p.brand , p.title , p.price , wo.wishlistoption_no wishlistoptionNo , wo.detailoption_no detailoptionNo , od.detailoption_name detailoptionName from wishlist w , product p , wishlist_option wo , option_detail od where w.product_no = p.product_no and w.wishlist_no = wo.wishlist_no and wo.detailoption_no = od.detailoption_no and w.user_no = #{userNo}
select c.event_no , c.event_name , c.event_date , u.user_no from calender c , users u where c.user_no = u.user_no and u.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: delete w.* from wishlist w , funding_product fp where w.wishlist_no = fp.wishlist_no and fp.event_no= #{eventNo}
